318 PM EST FRI JAN 2 2015

...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 7 PM EST
SATURDAY...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN GRAND RAPIDS HAS ISSUED A WINTER
WEATHER ADVISORY FOR FREEZING RAIN...SLEET AND SNOW...WHICH IS IN
EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY.

HAZARDOUS WEATHER...

 * SNOW WILL SPREAD IN LATE TONIGHT AND CHANGE OVER TO FREEZING
   RAIN OR SLEET SATURDAY MORNING. AS TEMPERATURES MODERATE SATURDAY
   AFTERNOON OR EVENING THE PRECIPITATION SHOULD CHANGE OVER TO
   PLAIN RAIN. SNOWFALL AMOUNTS OF LESS THAN 2 INCHES ARE
   EXPECTED. ICE ACCUMULATIONS OF UP TO A QUARTER INCH ARE ALSO
   POSSIBLE.

 * THE STORM IS DEVELOPING DOWN IN NEW MEXICO AND WILL TRACK
   THROUGH LOWER MICHIGAN SUNDAY MORNING.

IMPACTS...

* SLIPPERY ROADS CAN BE EXPECTED

* SCATTERED POWER OUTAGES 

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...


 * THE MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION REMINDS MOTORISTS 
   TO ADJUST SPEEDS BASED ON THE CONDITIONS... AND TO TAKE IT 
   SLOW IN ICE AND SNOW. 

 * WEATHER PREPAREDNESS INFORMATION IS AVAILABLE ON LINE AT 
   WWW.READY.GOV/WINTER AND HTTP://GO.USA.GOV/5OG.

...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM SATURDAY TO 10 AM
EST SUNDAY...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN GRAND RAPIDS HAS ISSUED A WINTER
WEATHER ADVISORY FOR SNOW...SLEET AND FREEZING RAIN...WHICH IS IN
EFFECT FROM 7 AM SATURDAY TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY.

HAZARDOUS WEATHER...

 * OCCASIONAL SNOW WILL SPREAD IN DURING THE MORNING AND CONTINUE
   INTO SUNDAY. THE PRECIPITATION WILL MIX WITH OR CHANGE TO SLEET
   OR FREEZING RAIN AT TIMES. SNOWFALL AMOUNTS OF 2 TO 4 INCHES
   ARE EXPECTED. ICE ACCUMULATIONS OF UP TO A QUARTER INCH ARE
   ALSO POSSIBLE.


 * THE STORM IS DEVELOPING DOWN IN NEW MEXICO AND WILL TRACK
   THROUGH LOWER MICHIGAN SUNDAY MORNING.

IMPACTS...

 * SLIPPERY ROADS CAN BE EXPECTED

 * SCATTERED POWER OUTAGES 

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...


 * THE MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION REMINDS MOTORISTS 
   TO ADJUST SPEEDS BASED ON THE CONDITIONS... AND TO TAKE IT 
   SLOW IN ICE AND SNOW. 

 * WEATHER PREPAREDNESS INFORMATION IS AVAILABLE ON LINE AT
